Type.description:
数据源类型。取值范围：

- URL
- NAS
- OSS
- SNAPSHOT

additionalProperties.description: 数据源的配置参数。不同类型数据源要传入的参数不同。各类型数据源及其配置参数说明，请参见[创建数据缓存](~~2391456~~)。

schema.description: 保留天数。过期会被清理。默认不过期。
保证请求幂等性。从您的客户端生成一个参数值，确保不同请求间该参数值唯一。只支持ASCII字符，且不能超过64个字符。更多信息，请参见[如何保证幂等性](~~25693~~)。
弹性公网IP。如果VPC没有配置NAT网关，可以绑定弹性公网IP，以便拉取公网数据。

创建一个弹性公网IP（EIP）并绑定。
如果VPC没有配置NAT网关，可以绑定EIP，以便拉取公网数据。

Bandwidth.description: EIP带宽。单位为Mbps。默认为5 Mbps。

CommonBandwidthPackage.description: 绑定已有的共享带宽包。

InternetChargeType.description:
EIP的计量方式。取值范围：

- PayByBandwidth：按带宽计费
- PayByTraffic：按流量计费

PublicIpAddressPoolId.description:
IP地址池ID。
EIP将从该IP地址池中分配。
IP地址池功能默认不开放。如需使用，请在配额中心申请IP地址池功能权益配额。

ISP.description:
EIP的线路类型。取值范围：

- BGP（默认值）：BGP（多线）线路
- BGP_PRO：BGP（多线）精品线路

400.errorMessage: Your account has an outstanding payment.
Request validation has been passed with DryRun flag set.
The specified cpu and memory are not allowed
The disk volume is not supported.
The RAM role is not supported.
Image cache is not available for all users. If you want to enable this function, contact us.
The ip address of specified PublicIpAddressPool is not enough.

403.errorMessage: The specified VSwitchId is not in the specified Zone.
The specified zone is not available for purchase.
This operation has been identified as an abnormal operation and cannot be processed.
The specified action is not available for you.
Eci create action is only open to invited users during public beta.
The specified VSwitchId and SecurityGroupId are not in the same VPC.
The specified VSwitch does not have enough IP addresses.
This operation is not allowed, because you have overdue bills. Pay the overdue bill and try again.
This operation is not allowed, because you have not passed the real-name verification.
The RAM user is not authorized to assume a RAM role.

Sales of this resource are temporarily suspended in the specified zone. We recommend that you use the multi-zone creation function to avoid the risk of insufficient resource. For more information, see https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/157290.html
The RAM role AliyunECIContainerGroupRole does not belong to eci.aliyuncs.com. Please check and try again.
We have detected a security risk with your default credit or debit card. Please proceed with verification via the link in your email.
Please make sure the account has ram:CreateServiceLinkedRole permission.
